parameter.name: host
parameter.label: Network Address
parameter.description: Network address of the Philips TV device.

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Network Port
parameter.description: Network port of the Philips TV device.

parameter.name: macAddress
parameter.label: MAC Address
parameter.description: MAC address of the Philips TV device.

parameter.name: pairingCode
parameter.label: Pairing Code (4 digits)
parameter.description: Initial pairing code for the Philips TV device to authenticate with the device.

parameter.name: refreshRate
parameter.label: Refresh Rate
parameter.description: How often the Philips TV status details get refreshed. Value in seconds. '0' deactives refreshing.

parameter.name: username
parameter.label: Username
parameter.description: Username from the pairing process with the Philips TV.

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: Password from the pairing process with the Philips TV.

parameter.name: useUpnpDiscovery
parameter.label: Use UPnP Discovery
parameter.description: Enables UPnP Discovery. If disabled, constant HTTPS polling will happen.
